author: Linus Tech Tips
description:
Whether you need a wedding ring, anniversary ring, or you just want a ring that looks awesome, head over to https://www.thorum.com and code LTT to get 20% off a truly unique ring

Nvidia's RTX Remix is a powerful tool, but it still takes developers and modders a lot of work to visually modernize old games with it. Orbifold Studio has been hard at work creating Half-Life 2 RTX, and the demo is finally here! How does it look compared to the original?

Discuss on the forum: https://linustechtips.com/topic/1605737-its-finally-here-half-life-2-rtx-demo-hands-on/

RTX Remix Overview: https://docs.omniverse.nvidia.com/kit/docs/rtx_remix/latest/docs/remix-overview.html
Half-Life 2 RTX: https://www.hl2rtx.com/

title: It's Finally Here! - Half-Life 2 RTX Demo Hands On
